snippet: Manchester United's F.A. Cup victory over Manchester City on Sunday was a game full of goals, intrigue and more than a few talking points:
abstract: Manchester United's F.A. Cup victory over Manchester City on Sunday was a game full of goals, intrigue and more than a few talking points:
lead_paragraph: Manchester United bounced Manchester City from the F.A. Cup on Sunday in a game that, according to Rob Hughes, proved that the city has not turned as decisively from red to blue as many thought.

headline.main: United Beats City, With a Surprise Guest: Scholes
